name: Cool Monkey 3D
description:
Cool Monkey 3D is a 3D Platformer video game with a focus on speedrunning. The player must navigate through each level as quickly as possible to record a new best time. They will do this by looking for secret shortcuts, platforming techniques, and exploits, while also making sure not to make mistakes.

CONTROLS:

Playstation controller: 

Jump:  X

Sprint:  L2

Pause + Resume:  Options/Start

Reset Level:  R1

Move:  Left Joystick

Control Camera:  Right Joystick

Select (Menu Buttons):  X

Navigate Menu:  Left Joystick

XBOX controller:

Jump:  A

Sprint:  LT

Pause + Resume:  Options/Start/the button with 3 lines

Reset Level:  RB

Move:  Left Joystick

Control Camera:  Right Joystick

Select (Menu Buttons):  A

Navigate Menu:  Left Joystick

Keyboard + Mouse:

Jump:  Space

Sprint:  Left Shift

Pause + Resume:  Escape

Reset Level:  R

Move Forward:  W

Move Left:  A

Move Backward:  S

Move Right:  D

Control Camera:  Mouse

Select (Menu Buttons):  Enter

Navigate Menu:  Arrow Keys
